kuweni amma mata kiwwa daruwa umbaa oya dewale patan ganin man umbaata pihita wennam kiyala ; ethakota mama kiwwa ane maniyo purushayath nathi mama mahum panthi thiyala mage daru dennata hondin uganwanna thamayi hithagena inne; ee hinda oya wage kapawimak karanna amaru weyi kiyala; ehema kiyapu mama kshadra mulya naya kihipayakma aragena wade aarambha kalath digata harahata puduma widiye badhaka enna patan gaththa, ethakota thamayi mata therune kuweni amma thamayi mewa karanne kiyala; thaman ge kamaththa itu nokalata.
